sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FiCalendar, FiDownload, FiMapPin } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; const BookingHistory = ({ bookings, onDownloadTicket }) => { return (

Booking History

{bookings.length === 0 ? (
✈️

No Bookings Yet

Start your journey by booking your first flight!

) : (
{bookings.map((booking) => (
{/* Booking Info */}
{/* Header */}
PNR
{booking.pnr}
Booking Date
{format(new Date(booking.booking_date), 'MMM dd, yyyy')}
Status
{booking.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + booking.status.slice(1)}
{/* Flight Info */}
{booking.flight_details.departure_city} → {booking.flight_details.arrival_city}
{booking.flight_details.airline}
Airline
{booking.passenger_name}
Passenger
{format(new Date(booking.flight_details.departure_time), 'MMM dd, yyyy')}
Travel Date
{/* Price & Download */}
₹{booking.final_price}
{booking.base_price !== booking.final_price && (
₹{booking.base_price}
)}
Final Price
{/* */} Download Ticket
))}
)} {/* Summary Card */} {bookings.length > 0 && (
{bookings.length}
Total Bookings
₹{bookings.reduce((sum, b) => sum + b.final_price, 0).toLocaleString()}
Total Spent
{new Set(bookings.map(b => b.flight_details.airline)).size}
Airlines
)}
); }; export default BookingHistory;
